pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe.

Prime Minister Abe offered his heartfelt condolences to those in Canada who had lost loved ones on the Ukraine International Airlines crash in Iran.

The Prime Ministers agreed that a thorough, credible, and transparent investigation into this tragic incident is essential.

The two leaders discussed Prime Minster Abeâ€™s upcoming trip to the Middle East and agreed on the importance of de-escalation for stability and security in the region.

The Prime Ministers also welcomed the strong and growing bilateral relations between Canada and Japan as well as their cooperation on international issues, and looked forward to working together on advancing this shared agenda.
